content: welcome blanket project pattern come together blanket by kat coyle the little knittery print 40 x40 lap blanket materials universal yarn deluxe bulky superwash 100% super- page 1 pattern wash wool 106 yd/97m per 3 5oz/100g mc red #936 cc page 2 assembly template cream #934 6 skeins each needles us 11/8 mm straight or size needed to achieve page 3 ideas for arrangements gauge notions tapestry needle gauge 12 sts and 24 row = 4 in garter stitch pattern make 16 squares with mc co 2sts row 1 k1 increase 1 with backward loop k to end repeat row 1 to 46 sts or 10 measured along right edge break yarn / join cc next row k1 k2tog k to end repeat last row until 2 sts remain nifty ways to next row k2tog fasten_off finishing arrange squares and assemble squares whipstitch together tutorials and more on neatly weave in loose ends welcomeblanket org project by jayna zweiman pattern by kat coyle illustration by abira ali @welcomeblanket #welcomeblanket welcomeblanket org my welcome blanket template use the squares to map out your blanket pattern use as many colors as you like there are hundreds of pattern combinations color and cut out squares arrange squares here @welcomeblanket #welcomeblanket welcomeblanket org here are just a few of the many ways to put squares together choose colors and combinations that make you happy welcomeblanket org
